detectors.description: Sale.fallback() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/41/410c7bc7e65ef69e17db21b2a6973114364eb7a3_Sale.sol#21-46) uses arbitrary from in transferFrom: tokenReward.transferFrom(owner,msg.sender,sendtoken) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/41/410c7bc7e65ef69e17db21b2a6973114364eb7a3_Sale.sol#39)

Sale.fallback() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/41/410c7bc7e65ef69e17db21b2a6973114364eb7a3_Sale.sol#21-46) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- sendtoken = (msg.value) / cost1token (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/41/410c7bc7e65ef69e17db21b2a6973114364eb7a3_Sale.sol#28)
	- sendtoken = sendtoken * 150 / 100 (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/41/410c7bc7e65ef69e17db21b2a6973114364eb7a3_Sale.sol#29)
